'''A Small Step for Hilichurls''' is a basic daily [[commission]] in Teyvat.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|[[Hilichurls]] are building a camp in the wilderness to gather their kin. Defeat them to put an end to this threat.}}
# Defeat all enemies (0/X)
